title: Monster Trucks
description: Readers will delight in this lively read-aloud story with a clever and surprising twist at the end—perfect for Halloween and year round!Ready, set, go! The monster truck race is on in this frightfully delightful picture book.  On a spooky speedway, Monster Trucks moan! Monster Trucks grumble! Monster Trucks groan!Join Frankentruck, Zombie Truck, Ghost Truck, and more as they race to the finish line. But one of these trucks isn’t quite who you think.
author: Anika Aldamuy Denise
